title: PlaceList: Your Personal AI Map
subtitle: Personalized Place Recommendations, LLM-powered Map Service
description: PlaceList is the map version of ChatGPT, recommending places tailored to your context.
hero_subtitle: The map version of ChatGPT, personalized place recommendations just for you
hero_description: Unlike existing map apps, PlaceList understands your preferences, situation, and context to recommend only the places you really need.
features_subtitle: A new experience different from existing map apps
feature_ai_desc: Learns your preferences and situation to provide accurate recommendations
feature_context_desc: Considers various factors like time, weather, mood, and more
use_case_1_desc: Discover restaurants and attractions like a local in your travel destination
use_case_2_desc: Get recommendations for perfect date locations considering your partner's preferences
use_case_3_desc: Find places that match your counterpart's personality and meeting purpose
video_subtitle: Create special moments with AI-recommended optimal spaces
gallery_subtitle: Check out the various places recommended by PlaceList
team_subtitle: A team building the future of spatial exploration
team_desc: We are revolutionizing people's spatial exploration experience by combining AI and spatial data.
contact_desc: Feel free to contact us for user interviews, partnerships, investment inquiries, and more.
form_message_placeholder: Please write freely about what you'd like to discuss or any questions you have...
form_success_desc: We'll contact you via email within 24 hours.
